name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Google Docs Explore or Research

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hide the Explore or Research Pane and Image Search in Google Docs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Primarily for assessment using Google Docs on Chromebooks, this extension automatically hides the Research panel and the Image Search panel within Google Docs to help ensure a secure testing environment.

To be used in conjunction with accounts which have been locked down via Google Apps Device Administration.
